effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.3 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 3,064 Haste for 12 sec.

Equip: Taking damage has a chance to erupt the ground, covering you in a layer of dark oil that absorbs 439,398 damage for 15 sec. When the shield is broken, it splatters nearby enemies for 105,503 Shadow damage.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
